original: Berglund, Arne Gustaf Jakob, prakt, läk., fabrikör, Motala, f. 6/6/01 i Bengtsfors, Älvsb. 1., av Wilhelm B. o. Hanna Andersson. G. 25 m. Edit Peterson. Barn: Nils f. 26, Bo 28, Sylve 31, Elisabeth 45. — Stud:ex. i Gbg 20, med. kand. i Upps. 26, med. Mc. i Lund 33. E. läk. i Ullareds, Gnesta o. Delsbo distr. 30-32, dito v. Lunds las. med. klin. 32, tillf, prov:-läk. i Harads o. Njurunda distr. 43-44, flyktingsläk. 45, skolläk. v. h. a. 1. i Motala sed. 45, prakt. läk. i Motala. Chef f. Motala Verktygsfabr. o. Motala Plastik 46. Stud:res. t. Tyskl. o. Fr an kr. 37.
translated: Berglund, Arne Gustaf Jakob, practical, physician, manufacturer, Motala, b. 6/6/01 in Bengtsfors, Älvsborgs län, son of Wilhelm B. and Hanna Andersson. Married on the 25th of a month in an unknown year to Edit Peterson. Children: Nils b. 26, Bo b. 28, Sylve b. 31, Elisabeth b. 45. He obtained his Bachelor of Science degree in 1920, studied medicine at Uppsala University in 1926, became a licensed physician in Lund in 1933, worked as a physician in several districts including Ullareds, Gnesta and Delsbo from 1930-1932, in the medical clinic of Lund's hospital temporarily in 1932, and as a provisional physician in Harads and Njurunda districts in 1943-1944. He served as a refugee physician in 1945, and as a school physician at h.a.1 in Motala since 1945. He is a practicing physician in Motala and also serves as the head of Motala Tools Factory and Motala Plastics since 1946. He undertook study trips to Germany and France in 1937.
